definition: stingless male bee in a colony of social bees (especially honeybees) whose sole function is to mate with the queen, talk in a monotonous voice
details:
noun
- stingless male bee in a colony of social bees (especially honeybees) whose sole function is to mate with the queen
- a pipe of the bagpipe that is tuned to produce a single continuous tone
= synonyms: drone pipe, bourdon
- an aircraft without a pilot that is operated by remote control
= synonyms: pilotless aircraft, radio-controlled aircraft
- an unchanging intonation
= synonyms: monotone, droning
- someone who takes more time than necessary
= synonyms: poke
verb
- talk in a monotonous voice
= synonyms: drone on
- make a monotonous low dull sound
